info.description:
Enter Zack and Cody's new life.
One night Zack and Cody were dreaming about life as bugs.
The next day their dream is made into reality when they find out that their room is bigger than before.
Soon they need to find a way to get normal again, or they need to accept their new life in a giant world.
info.pretty_title: The Shrunken Life of Zack & Cody
